actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to ensure that Federal Register notices submitted to the Bureau of Land Management are reviewed in a timely manner.

summary.text: Declares that if, by 45 days after a state Bureau of Land Management (BLM) office has submitted a Federal Register notice to the Washington, DC, office of the BLM for review by the Department of the Interior, the review has not been completed: (1) the notice shall consider to be approved, and (2) the state BLM office shall immediately forward the notice to the Federal Register for publication.

titles.title: A bill to ensure that Federal Register notices submitted to the Bureau of Land Management are reviewed in a timely manner.
A bill to ensure that Federal Register notices submitted to the Bureau of Land Management are reviewed in a timely manner.
